level.text: Objectives Generally. It is DCHA’s objective to ensure that families applying to DCHA for private rental housing assistance are selected for admission in accordance with the policies set forth in this Chapter 76.
Other Waiting Lists. When an applicant applies to DCHA for housing assistance DCHA shall offer the opportunity to be placed on all open DCHA waiting lists.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 52 DCR 11120 (August 20, 2004); as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 53 DCR 1153 (February 17, 2006).
